import pandas as pd

df3 = pd.read_csv('../input/df3')

source.1f1917c0:

df3.iloc[0:30].plot.area(alpha=0.4,ax=f.gca())
plt.legend(loc='center left', bbox_to_anchor=(1.0, 0.5))
plt.show()
